mapper.sql: id, name, namemd5, password, departmentid, department, realname, state, createtime, updatetime, tsno, email, sex, imgurl, birthday, province, city, country, ustate,signature
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, name, namemd5, password, departmentid, department, realname, state, createtime, updatetime, tsno, email, sex, imgurl, birthday, province, city, country, ustate,signature ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{departmentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tsno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ustate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
